tool_description: An API that scrapes news sources on climate change from around the world
name: Climate Change new scraper
title: Climate Change new scraper

api_list.name: Get All Climatechangenews
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all news from different news sources about climate change from around the world
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-new-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-new-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-new-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspapers}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-new-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
